hero.label: The Founder
hero.title: Agnes Kah
hero.subtitle: My Heart Beats for Africa
hero.description: Since 2009, I've been connecting travelers with Africa – authentically, respectfully, and with genuine passion. I've personally traveled every route over 10 times.

story.title: My Story
story.paragraph1: Africa touched me for the first time in 2009. What began as curiosity became passion and finally my calling. I quickly realized: mass tourism destroys exactly what travelers seek – genuine encounters, authentic culture, and unspoiled nature.

paragraph2.bold: I don't travel to Africa – I live there.
paragraph2.text: I have personally traveled every route over 10 times. I know the families who host us. I know where the best sunsets are and which encounters will touch your heart.

story.paragraph3: My mission is simple: to show you Africa as I love it – authentic, respectful, and with real encounters that will change you. Not planned from a desk, but from years of personal experience.
story.paragraph4: I firmly believe that travel connects the world and brings people closer together. But only when done right – with respect, sustainability, and genuine interest in people and their culture.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.description: To show Africa as it really is – with respect, authenticity, and genuine encounters. No shows, no staging, just real life.

expertise1.title: Personally Traveled
expertise1.description: Every route experienced 10+ times myself. I know every path, every family, every insider tip.

expertise2.title: Real Relationships
expertise2.description: Long-term partnerships with local communities. No intermediaries, only direct contacts.

expertise3.title: 12 Countries Expertise
expertise3.description: From Cameroon to South Africa – I know the diversity and uniqueness of each country.

expertise4.title: Small Groups
expertise4.description: Maximum 12 people. Large enough for community, small enough for genuine encounters.

expertise5.title: 100% Sustainable
expertise5.description: CO₂ compensated, fair prices, and 80% of money flows into local economy.

expertise6.title: Personal Care
expertise6.description: From first inquiry to return – I'm here for you.

mission.certificationsDescription: Quality and sustainability are not empty promises
